description:
Taiki`s team arrives in the fourth Kingdom, Cyber Land, a futuristic metal city wrapped in overwhelming silence. When a mechanical Whamon in the sky teleports a mechanical Andromon army from its mouth to attack them, the team dives inside the Whamon to destroy it. There they find a human girl named Ruka who says she was lost and the Bagra army captured her. Dorulumon is suspicious, but Taiki welcomes her into the team...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nazo no Cyber Land! Hagane no Machi no Bishoujo
The Mysterious Cyber Land! The Beauty of Fullmetal City
謎のサイバーランド! 鋼の街の美少女
